card.name: CW - GCCW127 - Uploading app time out

data.text:
@gillianoberholzer @stefanbar @yasserogier @willemhuman @cobuspienaar
Hi Stefan,

I understand what you are saying but this issue was not occurring until recently so there must be a cause. If that cause is server side then the correct people need to look into it.

It is happening to 4 agents at the moment:

1.	Koba Blignaut
2.	Jossie Wiggill
3.	Hassan Amod
4.	Brian Van Rooyen

Also, Gordon also had timeouts and that was from a server upstairs in our server room here so it is doubtful that it is client application or internet side.
